story_ch0064_00_rival_02_02000/2401_1201: Aw, man! I’m so bummed we lost!

But it was pretty close. If Rockruff didn’t give his
all on that last attack, who knows who
would’ve won.

(When I was having that battle with
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...)
(If I’d just made the right decision then...)
(Maybe I would’ve won?)

You really surprised me, Paulo. That battle earlier
wasn’t your usual style.
Huh?

’Cause in the past, you never liked letting your
Pokémon get hurt in battle.

I know you’re just trying out different tactics,
but still...
Sorry. I know it was pretty hard on him.
You should give him a treat later on, ’kay?

I know the reason why you’re experimenting is
because of all the new things you’ve seen here
on Pasio.
I think that’s a good thing.
I... I guess so. Thanks, Tina.
Hurry up! We’re gonna be late for the assembly!

Hold on! I gotta check if I remembered to bring my
Lift Key...
Team Rocket!

What’s your problem? Yeah, we’re Team Rocket.
What of it?
Hm? You look familiar, kid...

Oh yeah, I remember you! So you finally decided
to join us, eh?

What’re you talking about? Paulo would never
team up with people like you!

Never say never. There’s a little bit of badness in
everyone, y’know.

And Team Rocket welcomes anyone, even if
they’re only a little bad!

What’s with the scowl? Fine, you just need a little
convincing! We’ll make you an offer you
can’t refuse!
Ugh. Now you’re dragging us into a fight?

Just hand over your Pokémon, and we’ll go easy
on ya!

Shoot. Rockruff, can you hang in there just a
bit longer?

Don’t worry—Flareon and I can take care of
anything Rockruff can’t!
Our teamwork is unstoppable! Just watch!
Oof... These brats are stronger than I thought.

Come on! With your skills, you could become a top
leader in Team Rocket! You shouldn’t let a chance
like this pass you by!

Is now really the time to be impressed?! At this
rate, we’re gonna lose!
Having trouble?
Boss?!
Um... Sir? Weren’t you holding an assembly?
Yes, I was. But that’s over now.
I...I’m so sorry, boss!
Giovanni!
Who’s this dude?

He’s the leader of Team Rocket and a
skilled Trainer.
He’s as strong as Red... Maybe even stronger!
Wha—?!
We have to take him out! C’mon, Tina!
Y-yeah!

I suppose I should apologize for my subordinates
and their rude behavior.

I’ll take it from here. You children will be
cowering in fear once I’m through with you!
Rockruff!
Paulo!
Hey!
No way...
That was genius, boss!

Yeah, how’s that? You feelin’ scared outta your
wits yet?

You’re just overpowering us with numbers!
That’s so unfair!
Heh. Unfair? I beg to differ.

Putting together the potential of many is how you
produce a huge power... That’s the strength of
an organization!
You simply lack the power to match mine.

If you wish to take down Team Rocket, you’ll have
to assemble enough power to surpass mine. You’d
do well to remember that.
Gehehe! All right, hand over your Pokémon!
W-wait!
Hm?
Don’t take Tina’s Pokémon...
Please, I’m begging you!
P...Paulo?
We’re leaving.
S-sir? You sure about this?

Silence! You would have lost if I hadn’t
stepped in!
Eeep!

I only joined the battle because you were about to
sully our reputation.

You have matters to attend to that take higher
priority than stealing Pokémon from children, do
you not?

If you understand, then get back to
work! Immediately!
Y-yes, sir!
Did he just...let us off the hook?
I don’t know.

Sheesh. I gotta train more so we don’t lose to
guys like that from now on.
No...that won’t work.
Huh?
Training isn’t going to be enough.

The only way is to get stronger... What I need
is more power!
Paulo...
